unnormalised: Beginners should start with SIPs of Rs. 500 per month in mutual funds and gradually increase to Rs. 2000 as they learn more about the market; remember, returns are subject to market risk. Don't forget to factor in the GST @ 18% on brokerage charges while calculating your investment costs.
normalised: Beginners should start with S-I-P-s of rupee five hundred per month in mutual funds and gradually increase to rupee two thousand as they learn more about the market; remember, returns are subject to market risk. Don't forget to factor in the G-S-T at eighteen percent on brokerage charges while calculating your investment costs.
